name: Nature`s Secrets Aloe Moisturising Shaving Cream
description: This rich and creamy shaving cream formulated with Virgin Coconut Oil and Aloe Vera extract keeps skin soft, moisturised and fresh with every shave. Ideal for face & body use. Can be used by both men & women. Skin Friendly at pH 5.5-6.0. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
